item.title: Gradled Mini: Prototype Modular Discrete LED Display
item.author: Nathan Petersen
item.description: Gradled Mini after design, manufacturing, and assembly" Gradled Mini after design, manufacturing, and assembly Background This project came into being during my senior year of college at UW-Madison as a personal side venture. In May 2019, I complete my undergraduate schooling. It is not uncommon for students to decorate their graduation “hats” to personalize them and make them stand out in the crowd of graduates during the commencement ceremony. Typically, people create artwork related to the university they attended (i.

item.title: Razzler: POV LED Top
item.author: Nathan Petersen
item.description: Background Razzler: the Persistence of Vision LED Top" Razzler: the Persistence of Vision LED Top During the summer of 2017, I started working on my first real electronics project. This project marks the first time I have ever seen an electronics project all the way through, from start to finish: initial idea, schematic design, PCB layout, manufacturing, board assembly, testing, device driver development, and full firmware creation. I love LEDs and interactive toys, so I decided that I wanted to build a top that people could spin to entertain themselves.

item.title: Bluetooth Controlled LED Display
item.author: Nathan Petersen
item.description: Colorful display made from serially addressable LEDs for 4-H project.
